thread.title: Trump's pick for CIA chief dogged by secret prisons

title: Trump's pick for CIA chief dogged by secret prisons
text:
Trump's pick for CIA chief dogged by secret prisons 7:06pm GMT - 01:25 
Gina Haspel, the veteran CIA undercover officer President Donald Trump has picked to head the agency, has support within the U.S. intelligence community but has faced criticism for overseeing a secret CIA prison in Thailand. Ashraf Fahim has more.   
Gina Haspel, the veteran CIA undercover officer President Donald Trump has picked to head the agency, has support within the U.S. intelligence community but has faced criticism for overseeing a secret CIA prison in Thailand. Ashraf Fahim has more.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/03/14/trumps-pick-for-cia-chief-dogged-by-secr?videoId=408970579&videoChannel=13422
